The reason sorting does not work is b/c the BindingListCollectionView is looking for an ITypedList from the colleciton and cannot find it when it is a Table<T> or Table<T>.GetNewBindingList().  This is a known issue and unfortunately will have to be addressed in dev10.  In the meantime we are still looking for a workaround for the DataGrid.
